project.name: ZUI placeholder
project.description: ZUI placeholder provides utilities to enable placeholder support for older browsers.

gallery-zui-placeholder.name: gallery-zui-placeholder
gallery-zui-placeholder.description:
The Placeholder module provides utilities to enable placeholder
support for older browsers

Y.zui.placeholder.name: Y.zui.placeholder
Y.zui.placeholder.description: A static object to access zui placeholder properties and methods

classitems.description: whether this browser supports placeholder natively
classitems.name: isNative

classitems.description: A string used to set attribute to indicate this node installed placeholder or not
classitems.name: txtInstalled

classitems.description: A string used to set classname when this input should show placeholder
classitems.name: clsBlur

classitems.description: use this method to install placeholder on nodes
classitems.name: install

params.name: elements
params.description: Optional. The elements to install placeholder support

return.description: An array contains [TotalElements, InstalledElements] when no native placeholder support. Return undefined when the browser suppports placeholder natively. Return [0, 0] when can not find nodes

classitems.description: use this method to uninstall placeholder on nodes
classitems.name: uninstall

params.name: elements
params.description: Optional. The elements to remove placeholder support

return.description: An array contains [TotalElements, UninstalledElements] when no native placeholder support. Return undefined when the browser suppports placeholder natively. Return [0, 0] when can not find nodes

classitems.description: use this method to install placeholder on node with event delegate
classitems.name: installDelegate

params.name: element
params.description: Optional. The parent element to install placeholder support

params.name: elements
params.description: Optional. The child elements to handle placeholder

return.description: An array contains [1, InstalledElements] when no native placeholder support. Return undefined when the browser suppports placeholder natively. Return [0, 0] when can not find parent node. Return [-1, -1] when 'node-event-delegate' not loaded.

classitems.description: use this method to uninstall placeholder on node with event delegate
classitems.name: uninstallDelegate

params.name: element
params.description: Optional. The parent element to uninstall placeholder support

params.name: elements
params.description: Optional. The child elements to unhandle placeholder

return.description: An array contains [1, UninstalledElements] when no native placeholder support. Return undefined when the browser suppports placeholder natively. Return [0, 0] when can not find parent node. Return [-1, -1] when 'node-event-delegate' not loaded.
